title: Hexakill heads back to the FGM workshop

replies.body: Just a hint: Don't use the FGM acronym in future posts. I know you guys meant well, but do a quick google search before posting titles like that.
Oh God{{item:3070}}O_O{{item:3070}}
Yeah because that's what riot meant in this context right?
Thats why i said "I know you meant well." ^_^

For all we know, LoL could mean League of Legends, Laughing out Loud or even the dubious Lucifer our Lord... therefore, it actually really does depend on the context. Regardless of whether I meant well or not, I'll still be using FGM, so will riot, and you can continue to use 'Featured Game Mode' all you like.
eFFing Ga* Ma...
Good advice there.
yeah...they should really check that out....{{summoner:30}} {{summoner:30}} {{summoner:30}}
Lmfao
IM SO DUMB AND I FKING HAD TO SEARCH IT UP UUUGHHHHHHSADGY SADFAIYDF ALDFASI DGASGDI ASG
OMG xD
If its gone why can i still Q for it
please mutilate into urf next time ;)
Hexakill URF on TT{{champion:2}} {{champion:2}}
URF again plz
{{summoner:30}}
they really need to put bloodthirster on tt
lel still in q
im still in a q XD
{{champion:432}} Hexakill is boring. Bring out ranked ARAM!{{item:3187}}
shut up..

That would be fun, but it would also be kinda broken. All Pick Howling Abyss would be fun, ranked ARAM as it is would be so luck based and frustrating. Fun, but not a good tournament game.

Not that solo queue SR is any different, but you know. ARAM doesn't even pretend to be fair.
hahaha, thats so true about SR being completely unfair. So many ragers and feeders that you cant go anywhere
I would be soo keen for that!! O)_(o
